content.p: This page introduces you to all members of University Council, including University staff, student representatives and external members of Council. By clicking on the names below you can learn more about the representatives that make up the members of Council. You can also find out about the support team who work to ensure that University Council runs smoothly by visiting the Support Team section of this site. Andrew Armstrong Dr Pearl Agyakwa Vicky Bailey Dr Michelle Haslem Sonya Leydecker Giles Willits Professor Joanne Lymn Piyali Mitra Stephen Odell Anthony Murphy Jiale Zhang Nicola Maina Sir Keith O'Nions (Chair) Nora Senior Rakesh Sharma Professor Thomas Sotiriou Professor Sam Kingman Professor Jane Norman Secretary to University Council - Dr Paul Greatrix updated 21 September 2024 Registrar's Office, Trent Building University of Nottingham, University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5761 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
